dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S319 IS: To designate a mountain in the State of Alaska as Mount Denali.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Murkowski (for herself and Mr. Sullivan) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To designate a mountain in the State of Alaska as Mount Denali.

section.header: Designation of Mount Denali in the State of Alaska

subsection.text: The mountain located at 63° 04′ 12″ N, by 151° 00′ 18″ W, in the State of Alaska shall be known and designated as Mount Denali.
Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the mountain described in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to Mount Denali.
